Sentencas: The present paper discusses the dynamic behavior of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system under the load-following operation with adoption of four control schemes, conducting dynamic simulation.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: The dynamic modeling of the SOFC, which consists of a cell stack and reformer, was firstly carried out to predict the dynamic behavior to load change.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: Secondly, a control circuit model was implemented into the dynamic model.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: For the load-following operation, the SOFC DC power output, operating temperature, fuel utilization factor and steam-to-carbon ratio were employed as the controlled variables.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: The current density, air, fuel and steam flow rates were chosen for manipulated variables in the SOFC control schemes for the load-following operation.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: Feedback control methodology was adopted to achieve adequate operation of the SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: The dynamic simulation was conducted by assuming the rapid change of the power.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: The simulation results showed the capability of the multivariable control of the SOFC operation.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: The cell temperature control is quite important, however the direct measure of the cell temperature is difficult.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme

Sentencas: In the proposed control scheme, the air temperature at the cathode outlet is employed as a controlled variable, and then the cell temperature can be indirectly adjusted with controlling the cathode outlet temperature.
Titulo: Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme
Numerical analysis on dynamic behavior of solid oxide fuel cell with power output control scheme
